text: == Events == * January 24 - Pope Nicholas II takes over for Pope Stephen IX as the 155th Pope. He was placed in opposition to Antipope Benedict X. * August - Robert Guiscard signs the Treaty of Melfi with Pope Nicholas II. * Anselm settles at the Benedictine monastery of Le Bec in Normandy. * The Lateran Council makes the College of Cardinals the sole voters in the election of popes. * Muhammed ben Da'ud, known as Alp Arslan, becomes second sultan of the Seljuk Turks. * Peter Kre≈°imir IV is crowned King of Croatia and Dalmatia * Isaac I Comnenus resigns as Byzantine Emperor, appointing Constantine Ducas as his replacement. == Births == * Fulcher of Chartres, chronicler historian of the First Crusade == Deaths == * August 30 - Peter Urseolo of Hungary * Michael Cerularius, Patriarch of Constantinople == References ==
